description.title: Games United'a Hosgeldiniz.
description.description: We are a Venture Builder which enables startup teams with capital, vision, and strategic direction. Unlike gaming VC’s, a venture builder deals with the day-to-day operations and strategic decisions to grow the new business.

gameblock.title: Merge Park
gameblock.description: Welcome to Merge Park! New suprises and fun things keep happening. Are you ready to discover the new story and meet new characters?
